description: A line item for the Joist Girder summary schedule
title: JoistGirderSummaryItem

Designation.description: The designation of the Joist Girder

Total_Load_k.description: Total Load in K applied to this joist girder at panel points

Live_Load_k.description: Live load in K applied to this joist girder at panel points

NumberOfSpaces.description: The number of spaces (cells) on this joist girder

Quantity.description: Number of instances of this joist girder type
